title: This 14-inch MacBook Pro just fell to $1,299, an all-time low price
description: In an exclusive holiday blowout deal, Apple Authorized Reseller B&H has dropped the price of a closeout M3 MacBook Pro 14-inch to just $1,299 when equipped with 16GB RAM.Get a 14-inch MacBook Pro for $1,299 just in time for the holidays.Save $500 on the M3 14-inch MacBook Pro with 16GB of RAM and 512GB of storage when you shop through the special pricing links in this post* from a laptop or desktop computer.Buy for $1,299 Continue Reading on AppleInsider | Discuss on our Forums
author: Christine McKee
excerpt: In an exclusive holiday blowout deal, Apple Authorized Reseller B&H has dropped the price of a closeout M3 MacBook Pro 14-inch to just $1,299 when equipped with 16GB RAM.
text: In an exclusive holiday blowout deal, Apple Authorized Reseller B&H has dropped the price of a closeout M3 MacBook Pro 14-inch to just $1,299 when equipped with 16GB RAM. Save $500 on the M3 14-inch MacBook Pro with 16GB of RAM and 512GB of storage when you shop through the special pricing links in this post* from a laptop or desktop computer. Buy for $1,299 This configuration in Space Gray originally retailed for $1,799, but it's marked down to $1,299 while supplies last. In addition to the being the lowest price available, B&H is throwing in free 2-day shipping within the contiguous U.S. for fast delivery to your door just in time for Hanukkah and Christmas. B&H's store card, dubbed Payboo, also offers your choice of an instant sales tax refund in qualifying states or special financing, potentially saving you $130 over buying at another retailer. According to our Mac Price Guide, which tracks the top MacBook Pro deals on current and closeout models, this exclusive price is the cheapest available on the M3/16GB/512GB spec, with other Apple resellers charging at least $200 more. If you need an ultraportable model, B&H is also offering readers an exclusive discount on the M3 15-inch MacBook Air with 24GB of RAM and 1TB of storage for $1,699.
html:
In an exclusive holiday blowout deal, Apple Authorized Reseller B&H has dropped the price of a closeout M3 MacBook Pro 14-inch to just $1,299 when equipped with 16GB RAM.

Save $500 on the M3 14-inch MacBook Pro with 16GB of RAM and 512GB of storage when you shop through the special pricing links in this post* from a laptop or desktop computer.

Buy for $1,299

This configuration in Space Gray originally retailed for $1,799, but it's marked down to $1,299 while supplies last. In addition to the being the lowest price available, B&H is throwing in free 2-day shipping within the contiguous U.S. for fast delivery to your door just in time for Hanukkah and Christmas.

B&H's store card, dubbed Payboo, also offers your choice of an instant sales tax refund in qualifying states or special financing, potentially saving you $130 over buying at another retailer.

According to our Mac Price Guide, which tracks the top MacBook Pro deals on current and closeout models, this exclusive price is the cheapest available on the M3/16GB/512GB spec, with other Apple resellers charging at least $200 more.

If you need an ultraportable model, B&H is also offering readers an exclusive discount on the M3 15-inch MacBook Air with 24GB of RAM and 1TB of storage for $1,699.
